text: Manuel Busto (1 October 1932 - 9 October 2017) was a French professional racing cyclist. He rode in six editions of the Tour de France. He was born in Cransac, France. Busto died on 9 October 2017 in Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, France at the age of 85.Manuel Busto, figure du cyclisme millavois, est décédé ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Aveyron Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie
title: Manuel Busto
